title: safeguarding privacy confidentiality and civil
extract: Privacy and Confidentiality. The terms 'privacy' and 'confidentiality' are commonly used interchangeably. However, they are related but not identical concepts. ... The legal duty of confidentiality obliges health care practitioners to protect their patients against inappropriate disclosure of personal health information.
extract_html: Privacy and Confidentiality. The terms 'privacy' and 'confidentiality' are commonly used interchangeably. However, they are related but not identical concepts. ... The legal duty of confidentiality obliges health care practitioners to protect their patients against inappropriate disclosure of personal health information.
